channel.title: Compiler-extensions on Ante
channel.description: Recent content in Compiler-extensions on Ante

item.title: Build System
item.description: The Build module defines several useful functions for compiling and linking applications. Its interface is as follows: option ante fun option: Str opt Equivalent to passing the string opt while evoking the compiler, eg. a call to option "-O3" is equivalent to compiling a module with ante -O3 If the given option is not recognized a compilation error will be issued with the message “Unrecognized option ${opt}” ante fun option: CompilerFlag f Enables the compiler flag f.
